timeline.message:
Merging Dispatcher to ParallelDispatcher (1/2)
https://github.com/eclipse/omr/issues/4611

This is the fist of the two PRs on OpenJ9 side.
Change all Dispatcher type to ParallelDispatcher;
Cast some variants of type Dispatcher to ParallelDispatcher to be compatible with OMR side,
which will be removed in the following PR.
Change createDispatcher() => CreateParallelDispatcher() to create
instances of ParallelDispatcher.

Signed-off-by: Enson Guo <enson.guo@ibm.com>
